testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say

0.q: What is IPL and how does it work?
0.a: IPL (Intense Pulsed Light) uses broad-spectrum light to target hair follicles, safely and effectively reducing hair growth.

1.a: Yes, we provide complete customization of features, colors, packaging, and more to match your brand needs.

2.a: We support FDA, CE, RoHS, and other global certifications to ensure compliance with your target markets.

3.q: How long is the production lead time?
3.a: Typical lead time is 25-35 days after sample approval, depending on order size and customization.

4.a: Yes, we provide comprehensive after-sales service including technical support and warranty.

5.a: Certainly. We provide reliable worldwide shipping to support your business wherever you are.

hero.title: Custom Logo Printing
hero.subtitle: iShine offers professional logo customization for IPL devices—choose UV printing for speed and value, or screen printing for premium, lasting results.

screenPrinting.label: Screen Printing
screenPrinting.description: Premium finish, crisp lines, and excellent durability—ideal for brands seeking the best tactile and visual effect. Slightly higher cost, but preferred for orders over 20 units. Supports 1-2 color logos on curved surfaces.

surface.label: Surface Compatibility
surface.value: Both methods work on the slightly curved IPL device body.

moq.label: MOQ for Screen Printing
moq.value: Best value for orders over 20 units.

premium.label: Premium Choice
premium.value: Screen printing delivers the most premium finish and tactile feel for your brand logo.

cta.title: Ready to Brand Your IPL Device?
cta.subtitle: Our team will help you choose the best logo printing method for your project—ensuring your brand stands out.

hero.title: Multi-Head IPL Systems
hero.subtitle: iShine engineers custom IPL attachment heads for every treatment scenario—from precision facial work to full-body coverage, with specialized solutions for dark skin comfort and professional efficiency.

precisionFace.name: Precision Face Head
precisionFace.application: Upper lip, chin, jawline precision treatment
precisionFace.features: Extra UV filter, flat design for facial contours

underarm.name: Curved Underarm Head
underarm.features: Curved design for better contact, integrated cooling

body.name: Large Body Head
body.application: Legs, back, chest large area treatment
body.features: Wide coverage, high energy output for faster sessions

darkSkin.name: Dark Skin Safe Head
darkSkin.application: Safe treatment for darker skin tones
darkSkin.features: Specialized filter for melanin protection, gentle mode

cta.title: Customize Your Multi-Head System

aiPoweredSkinSensing.title: AI-Powered Skin Sensing Technology in Modern IPL Devices
aiPoweredSkinSensing.excerpt: How artificial intelligence is revolutionizing IPL treatments with intelligent skin detection and personalized settings.
aiPoweredSkinSensing.author: iShine Team

introduction.content: In the evolving world of beauty technology, AI is transforming how we approach hair removal. Discover how iShine's AI-powered IPL devices are setting new standards in safety and effectiveness.

benefits.title: Key Benefits
items: Automatic skin tone detection for safe treatments

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.content: The AI sensor analyzes skin tone and hair color in milliseconds, adjusting light intensity accordingly for optimal results.

aiPoweredSkinSensing.conclusion: Embrace the future of hair removal with iShine's AI technology.

iplHairRemoval.accessoriesDescription: Complement your IPL device with our range of high-quality accessories designed to enhance your hair removal experience.
iplHairRemoval.smartTechnologyIntegrationDescription: Seamless app connectivity for personalized treatments and progress tracking.
iplHairRemoval.coolingComfortSystemsDescription: Ice feeling and cooling technology for pain-free hair removal sessions.
iplHairRemoval.intelligentSkinSensorsDescription: AI-powered sensors that adapt to your skin tone for safe, optimal results.
